title: "Viral Wallpapers"
content:
Welcome to our website featuring a unique collection of wallpapers inspired by computer viruses and malware. Our abstract designs, set against a black background, create a striking visual impact that is sure to make your desktop stand out. 

Our wallpapers are perfect for those who want to add an edgy and unconventional touch to their digital environment. Whether you're a fan of technology, art, or simply looking for something different, our viral wallpapers are the perfect choice.

We offer a wide range of designs, each with its own distinct personality and style. From intricate patterns to bold shapes, our wallpapers are designed to capture the essence of computer viruses and malware in a visually stunning way.

So why settle for a boring wallpaper when you can have one that's truly unique? Browse our collection today and discover the perfect viral wallpaper for your desktop.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
